price: Maze hasigare gusa Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Yo Yonyene ubwayo, Nyenicubahiro kirengeye vyose, Nyenubugwaneza[4].
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
footnotes: [4] Muri iyi Aayah, harimwo icemezo c’uko Imana Allah Ifise mu maso mu buryo buberanye n’icubahiro cayo, ata kugereranya mu maso hayo n’ah’ibiremwa mu kuntu hasa n’ukuntu haremye.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
